title: Shop Samantha Joy
description: Shop Samantha Joy is well-known for their unique aromatherapy bottle necklaces that are made out of real crystal. Choose your favorite crystal, take off the top of your pendant, use the pipette that we send you to insert your favorite perfume or essential oil, and enjoy your perfume on the go.
